title: [ALL RANKS] [FINAL CALL]  Iscariot Esports Recruitment. SPOTS OPEN IN 3 TEAMS

embed.description: We are Iscariot Esports and are currently looking for players for team's in EVERY DIVISION. Staff position also available if interested. Positions are limited but we will be reviewing each candidate. (Selection process will include a friendly scrim).

body:
Hello All,

**FINAL ANNOUNCEMENT. SUITABLE APPLICANTS WILL BE CONTACTED FROM THE 17/9 - 23/9.**

Iscariot Esports is looking for a dedicated players to fill our teams. 
This will be the final announcement so if you want to join the team, complete this before the **17/9**.
There are spots open currently in 3 teams in the OCE region. (ALL ranks ENCOURAGED), as well as players of all positions for substitute roles.
We will be entering tournaments and we are looking to play a part in the development of the OCE community and with your help we will be achieve that.

**Team Longinus**

- Team Longinus will be our OOL team, mostly aimed at Diamond+ players with a desire to play in the OCS/OPL.
- Players with previous team experience is preferred but it is not a requirement. 
- Players from this team may drop into Team Sudarim, if seen as severely under-performing.

**Team Sudarim**

- This team will also be an OOL team, but is more suited towards players without much team experience and looking to try out the OCE competitive scene. 
- Any player that is Gold+ may join this team. 
- Players may get offered a chance to move up into Team Longinus if they display strong improvement.

**Team Grazal**

- This will be a team that is mainly for players that want a better grasp of how to effectively communicate with teammates.
- Any player wanting to play in and experiencing a team environment while also building there skills as individuals is welcome!
- ANY player in ANY rank may join this team. As is the same for all other teams, players in this team also have the opportunity to move up
into more competitive teams within the organization.

The main thing we ask from you before joining any of our team is COMMITMENT.

_PLEASE ONLY COMPLETE THIS FORM ONCE._
